description: Clark is back, and he's brought a friend. That friend would be Brodie, the 25 year old dark haired, muscled, football playing college guy. Clark was just kicking back one recent day with some time to kill before his training session at the gym. There's nothing that gets him in the mood to work out more than the feeling of an orgasm pulsing throughout his body. So Clark decides to throw on a newly purchased skin flick and get to stroking. But before he is even able to get out of his pants, Brodie shows up without an invite. Since these two are good buddies, it's not a problem.Since no one's watching, Brodie decides to get a nut off too, so he takes a seat next to Clark and they start off on the quest of cum.Enjoy!
title: Brodie & Clark 2
